item.title: Hello! I'm Guilherme.
item.description: Developer since 2011, I consider myself as a continuous learner. I like to read new books, try new things, and travel around to shape my view of the world. I’ve been always curious about how digital is shaping our futures (I expect good) and how is my responsibility as a developer on it. In my earlier career, I had the experience to construct a SaaS platform. It was an application with a services built-in.

item.title: How to make sure my product is Fit for Purpose? A powerful framework explained.
item.description: Fit-for-purpose (F4P) framework was created by David Anderson and Alexei Zherglov, references on market about Kanban Method. Kanban comes as a way to manage services better. Evolutive approach. Now, F4P is how we can improve the purpose of our services in organization. Links: https://www.fitterforpurpose.com/

item.title: Comportamento Tribal: Great Boss, Dead Boss
item.description: A humanidade desde seus primórdios, vem se organizando em tribos. Após milhares de anos, ainda detemos em nosso comportamento, vários atributos e princípios tribais. Great Boss, Dead Boss, criado por Ray Immelman, demonstra como você, líder de sua equipe, pode liderar e resolver conflitos existentes em sua organização com uma “lente tribal”. Criamos esse podcast com o intuito de resumir alguns aspectos ligados ao comportamento tribal do livro. Espero que gostem.
